thread.title: Very impressed by Felicien
thread.title_full: Very impressed by Felicien - Review of Hotel Felicien by Elegancia, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Pathamaporn M
title: Very impressed by Felicien
text:
I spent two nights for my business trip in Paris. The hotel is located very close to Eiffel Tower. I was really impressed by the hotel location, staffs, service, comfy bed and breakfast. Definitely, I will stay at this hotel again when I go back to Paris :)
Room Tip: Quiet room See more room tips
